website_summaries.verdict: Offers great screen size, resolution, and robust capabilities for everything from video streaming to artwork.
pros: Long battery life and excellent storage capabilities
Included S Pen is a big plus, and tablet is robust enough to run more advanced drawing and graphics apps
cons: Charging cord is too short for some users
Pre-bundled apps may bog down performance, but can be switched off
A few reported issues with screen failing after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Beats carrying around a laptop & runs on Android!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace carrying around a laptop when we travel for fun. It weighs just over a pound and is easy to carry around. I love all the features like the built in micro-USB port, and the included micro-USB to USB 2.0 connector cable, and the high screen resolution. The fact that I can upgrade the storage space to an available 2TB is mind blowing. Having up to 13 hours of workable time is another great feature. I bought a 128GB SD card to see if that is enough space for now. My wife thought we might need to get a wireless keyboard, but once she saw how large the on-screen keyboard is said that is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GearHeadPeter

customer_reviews.title: I am a seventy five year old on a fixed income who thought I would be getting a good deal for me for personal use and now I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this tablet on June 11, 2017. Started having problems with tablet cutting off while surfing the net. It would just shut down. After a few days that stopped happening. Thought it was ok. Last night put table on charge and when I attempted to turn it on today, it is completely dead. Notice under my purchase orders states " not eligible for returns after July 11,2017. I am a seventy five year old on a fixed income who thought I would be getting a good deal for me for personal use and now I'm out of $220.00 plus the price of keyboard and cover. I am heart broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died for no reason at 11 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought for my son. The first one lasted 6 years, this one just died for no reason. He was using it and closed it - went back to turn it on and nothing. Completely dead. Tried charging, tried turning it on- total black screen. Will call on Tuesday(tomorrow Labor Day) will update when I find out if Samsung stands by their warranty. Really hope so, very upset by this.
customer_reviews.author: Greysean

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience with Samsung customer service, will not purchase Samsung products ever again.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet turns off on its own. Called Samsung customer service four times, customer service making promises to return phone call, never happens. Will not replace after 4 months of purchase. Poor quality product and customer service. Will never buy Samsung product again.
customer_reviews.author: ccr

customer_reviews.title: Screen Went Black After 10 Days.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the Samsung Galaxy Tab A. I own 2 old Galaxy Tab 10.1 (had them for over 6 years) no problem with them, just wanted to upgrade. This one did not last but 10 days. Screen turned off, nothing I do will bring it back on. Tried everything, and called Amazon's Tech Support. Long story short, sending it back today. Reading the reviews it seems that it is a very common problem with this tablet. Not sure if I'm getting a replacement or just wait until Samsung works out all the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo A

customer_reviews.title: Bad memory management
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is terrible with internal memory. 1st it keeps adding unwanted apps the keeps eating up internal memory. I bought a memory card to move the major apps to the external memory card. It still puts copies of games to the internal memory. After only one year of usage i keep getting notices of insufficent memory. Sooner or later the tablet wiil just be useless. Wasted $
customer_reviews.author: Carl W. Taitano

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! This screen resolution is wonderful. Originally I had the 9.7 tab a and I was not satisfied with the screen resolution, so I sent it back when this tablet was announced. I do not regret my decision at all. If you are trying to decide between the 9.7 or the 10.1, I recommend you get the 10.1
customer_reviews.author: Shelia

customer_reviews.title: Device overheated and not charging.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tablet about 4months. Today I noticed that the flashlight on the back of the tablet turned on even if I didn’t turned it on. Also it was super hot around the flashlight. I almost got burn!!!! I tried to restart the device. The screen turned off. But it didn’t restart until the flashlight turned off automatically after draining battery almost 50%. It still drains battery and overheats device. And Tablet is not charging at all. I am really disappointed it’s quality. :(
customer_reviews.author: Seung Man Kim

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed!!!! 2 devices had to be returned!
customer_reviews.text: Even before completing the set up, the tablet would shut itself down. Then afterward, it continued to randomly shut down. I requested a replacement and the new device did the same exact thing! This time I got a refund. Won't buy another Samsung tablet again! P.S. after encountering this problem, I read the reviews on this product and while there were good ones, it seems that all the negative ones were for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Another great Samsung product - must buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife and she absolutely loves it. The screen size is adequate enough to do all kinds of internet browsing, emails, and of course media binge watching. Including YouTube, Netflix, and the lovely Amazon Prime. The battery life on average lasts over 3 days with moderate use, this includes being connected to wifi at all times, screen time on avg of about 4 hours per day, and no gaming whatsoever. The resolution is nice and crisp, this definitely feels like a premium product. The speakers on board are very loud and clear. The touch is exceptionally responsive as with all Samsung products. It is definitely worth the price and provides excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: TechSavvyBuyerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Warning...It just stops turning on.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet itself is great, however after 3 weeks of use it stopped turning on. Apparently based on other reviews this is a common issue. I used Samsung chat for assistance and they told me to hold the power button and volume down button at the same time for 60 seconds and it should come back on. I tried that several times and it didn't work. Fortunately the company sent me a return label and now I am waiting on that refund. I want to get another one but am very skeptical at buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi L.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY you will REGRET IT
customer_reviews.text: this product was good for about 2 months then went straight to black screen but still made a noise. Ask to return it they said no since it was beyond the 90 day mark which was correct due to it being a gift. So took it to a shop they fixed it for 100 dollars n then guess what 2 days later black screen again. The charging outlet is not very good in these products so jus a little shake the thing is done. So jus pay the extra 100 dollars n get an ipad from best buy or sams or wherever else. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS PLACE YOU WILL REGRET IT
customer_reviews.author: Amanda nole

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this tablet
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 months the tablet doesn't want to charge and I have to play with the charger to get it just right each time. Now it is ten months later and it's not charging at all. Customer support is awful, I tried doing a chat and I kept getting asked for my email, which I don't want to provide. Awful product, this is the second Samsung tablet I have had this issue with, the reason I replaced my last one, I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on paper. In real life, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Only about 5GB of the 16GB of memory is available. The operating system and Samsung junk take up 3/4 of the space, so I was unable to migrate important applications from another device. It is possible to move some of the applications to an SD card, but many of the larger applications must run in main memory and all of the Samsung junk cannot be uninstalled or moved. It's considerably heavier than an iPad. The build quality seems good and I have other Samsung devices, so I really wanted to like this. After trying for a week to like it, though, I could not.
customer_reviews.author: TechByter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet, definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Tablet (Leisure, games, videos) Ive had it for a few days now and I have to say, for a budget tablet, this thing is a beast. I LOVE IT. Fast, Bright, and very capable for numerous projects. Pros: Big, bright screen. Excellent touch screen sensitivity. Multi-window is rad. High quality for a budget tablet. I like making pretend I have a giant phone. Cons: Speakers on the bottom (When tablet is sideways for video watching, it feels like you have one earbud in), Not much else
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Claw

customer_reviews.title: Not me for sure and its optimized to run most vidoes on youtube at 420p and i was like oooh hell no and i said you going back ...
customer_reviews.text: This one Meets all my expectation and its not going back home, its keeper for sure. I originally got the galaxy tab a 8 inch the latest version 2017 model but in about 30 minute of playing with it, i decided to return it why because its only 730p who wants that ppi in 2018? Not me for sure and its optimized to run most vidoes on youtube at 420p and i was like oooh hell no and i said you going back home tomorrow as soon as ups opens. But this one has full hd 1080p or higher resolution and its built like a champion. Everything about is so smooth and likeable.
customer_reviews.author: mongol

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet if you like the larger size--not my preference
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it to play movies, games, for Audible, mostly for fun. I wanted to try the larger screen because my previous tablets were the 8 inch. But I found that I preferred the smaller tablets, probably because it's what I am used to and it's easier for my hands to hold. The screen and everything worked well, looked beautiful. I sold it to my cousin who had been wanting one and she bought it with all the accessories I had gotten. I'll be getting the smaller size just as a personal preference. She loves it and spends hours passing time playing games. She is elderly and had never used one before.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: but my husband is a galaxy fan so I decided to try this tablet and it's awesome. It comes with some cute games that my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am (was?) a loyal Apple fan, but my husband is a galaxy fan so I decided to try this tablet and it's awesome. It comes with some cute games that my toddler likes, it has all the standard stuff you'd want from a tablet, and it's GREAT for reading comics, if you're into that. The battery lasts a long time too. I like it much better than my husband's iPad that I insisted he get back when he bought a tablet for himself. But he can never find out he was right and I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a 256gb micro SD card to go with it.  You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: Our first tablet, so nothing to compare it with. However, it suits our needs. My husband and I both have Samsung phones, so the interface is familiar. We are sharing so made sure to setup two different users so we don't have to log-in and out of each of our apps. We purchased a 256GB micro SD card, but found out after much research that Samsung has disabled the feature on this model to automatically have apps download to the card. We manually moved our apps from internal memory to the card. We also purchased a bluetooth keyboard and case. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Classy Keys

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I got this tablet since July 2019, and I've been very unhappy with the touch screen responsiveness from the first day. For some reason touching and holding in order to open links in a new tab on a web page requires multiple tries. Similarly, when attempting to edit text, touching to select a word will require the same thing. I'm not talkin touch release once or twice; I'm talkin six or seven times in a row. I've modified every possible setting, I've researched advice on the internet for similar issues. For 7 months I've done everything to resolve this. Nothing changes this. I feel that it's a poor touch screen, and a delightful tablet is brought low by this failure.
customer_reviews.author: K. Corley

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves them
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased 3 of these so far and everyone who has one of them loves it. They are used as internet devices mostly on social media, web browsing, watching videos/movies and light duty gaming. For these uses they perform great with no noticeable delays or lags. Screen quality is sharp and clear and the touch sensitivity is very good. Battery life has been averaging between 10 to 13 hours depending on how it's being used and they recharge completely in less than 3 hours. We added 128GB SD memory cards for additional RAM and have had success.
customer_reviews.author: dsayers2

customer_reviews.title: Use it more than a laptop
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this about a year ago. My 1st tablet at the age of 54. Absolutely love it. Never thought I'd use it more than my laptop, but I do. Nice screen, great battery life, no complaints whatsoever. Pack the tablet and Bose SoundLink III for vacations and both will last all day on the beach. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jwalenta

customer_reviews.title: Really a large, touch sensitive android phone
customer_reviews.text: II can see the screen better than my phone, but it is really awkward to hold. I can't explain it very well, but you need two hands, and I am forever nicking the edge of the screen with my fingers and switching the display by accident. It is really an unpleasant experience to use. Not to mention that now I have to buy usb-c cords, because I guess this was refurbished and the cord was missing. I'm giving it 3 stars because it IS as described, and my complaints are mainly user preference. But I wish I had sprung for an ipad and an e-reader instead.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging and working in only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. All of a sudden,my tablet has stopped charging despite getting a new charger. Also will not charge with wireless charger. I have only had the tablet for 3 months. I am now using my 2014 Note. I had bought the Tab A when the Note would not charge but a new charger solved that issue. It still continues to work well. Very disappointed in the Tab A.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen - Over & Over & Over again
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product as defective. I would touch an Icon 4 to 6 times, it would not open. I touched a different Icon, opened that app, closed it and went back to the originally desired app and it (might) open. Many tries, always the same result. That was my primary reason for return. Secondary, the tablet was quite slow to come up, once the 4 digit security code was entered, it would scroll for another 10+ seconds before opening. Seems like the processor may be under powered? I don't know, but I was very disappointed in the performance.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Bad tablet. Bad refurbishment seller.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet died within one month of purchase. Won’t charge. Won’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Norman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet! I have been using samsung products for several years and none of them have disappointed me yet! This size is makes it easy to see things and the graphics are great. The processing system is plenty fast for everything I need. It works well on my wifi and with my bluetooth devices. All the the controls and features are set up the same as my phone so it's very easy for me to navigate around. I will definitely continue to be a dedicated samsung customer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: After my first review saddly have to say that he battery last only 8 months! A battery replacement cannot be shipped to Hawaii!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I bought another tablet because someone told and show me the WhatsApp app in a Samsung Galaxy Tablet. When I tried to download the app I got the same message that I got in my other tablet "the app is not compatible with your device". After a good research I was able to download it. Now I'm connected easily by phone, video, messages, texts, etc. FREE with family and friends around the world. I've been having a little trouble taking pictures with the camera (no issues with video) I think a little research will resolve my issues. I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Coha92

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. My husband was excited over the gift at first until he realized it was a 2016 model, NOT A 2018 OR 2019 MODEL. This was embarrassing for me because there was no mention of it being an older model. I thought I was buying the latest tablet for him and it was NOT! I sent it back post haste. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nan H. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Love my tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. I had bought one for my ex years ago and loved it. Finally bought myself one last July (2019), though of course I bought myself a larger screen size. Very happy with my purchase. This tablet works amazing, battery life is great, like that I can make separate user accounts on it easily. Honestly, there isnt anything I can say I dislike about it so far. This 10" screen size is even nice for camping to watch downloaded movies with others, I even got a keyboard screencover for if I need to do typed projects and the size is great for that as well. I definitely recommend a Samsung tablet if buying.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowofawolf

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Great device, I have used the device for over 1 week. So far good. Nice build quality. Great display, camera, and sound. I would recommend a case for this tablet. The device kept slipping out my had, once I purchased a case I no longer had any issues. It's Android/Samsung... I use this device mostly to watch videos, search the web, and play music. Really easy to use. Also the device has a Great battery life over 5 days before needing a charge. Not heavy at all, also I purchased and SD card for extra Memory.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Love Samsung Galaxy tablets and phones. I am so grateful to have another Samsung tablet again. Tried another brand, it didn't last. The large clear screen is easy to navigate, I enjoy the simple button set up, android running system, and easy identifying icons. The only thing I wish is an always on option but it absolutely does what is necessary to keep in touch! Video chat no matter the app is wonderful. I have tried Google Duo, FB Messenger and Skype. Excellence in a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Superbeast1070

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, should have done more research before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this tablet performs how I anticipated a Samsung tablet would. HOWEVER- I did not know that Android took away the ability to save apps to the sd card, which makes the storage on this tablet insufficient for me, as I was hoping to use this to play games with, so maybe something to keep in mind and go with a larger built in storage option instead. This works great for scrolling through social media, watching videos, and Netflix, not so much for PUBG Mobile haha.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice except the screen resolution is so tight that text ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice except the screen resolution is so tight that text is so small it can be difficult to read. Tight screen resolution is awesome for graphics. I personally would like this tablet better if it's width dimension was the same as the Galaxy Tab A 9.7. I purchased this 10.1 Galaxy Tab A expecting it to be same width as the 9.7 and simply taller. Surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: EASY START UP & EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something bigger than my phone to keep up with email, Facebook, and a few other low key things I do that do not need huge computing power. This device let me sync up with my network, my Google account, etc., and I can take it around the house and not be tied to my computer...simpler and cheaper than a laptop. Since my phone is Samsung, it was easy to start up and get going. Have had only a week, but there are no issues and makes social media and email easier, as well as surfing the web.
customer_reviews.author: Dad Erson

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. With ageing eyes it makes things so much easier to see and read. Nothing that I cant do on this that I can do on my cell phone, other than actually calling of course.
customer_reviews.author: Bob N

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my mom....UPDATE the screen went black!
customer_reviews.text: She likes it, she plays on it and does facebook but she doesn't understand any of it. But she likes it. UPDATE!! After only 4 months, the screen went black, won't power on, won't take a charge...NOTHING! I am SO SORRY my 75 year old mother has to buy an iPad to replace her defective Samsung device! I wish I would have left this on Amazon's shelf! UGH!!
customer_reviews.author: BillyMe

customer_reviews.title: All you can ask for in a tablet.
customer_reviews.text: When. I bought this I didn't knowa thing about tablets. Had to get something when my computer died and my nephews said get one of threse...a Samsung Galaxy tab A. Helped it was on sale too. Had lots on memory cards from my cameras so didn't need to buy more. It works very well like a laptop and does everything a computer does. Lots of free apps too. Only thing I wish it would have had is some kind of basic insructions to give some idea how to use it. Fortunately I have younger relatives t help me out. Great tablet at a great price. Check it out. The 10.1 in screen is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph C. Browne

customer_reviews.title: I got it at a great deal from Amazon and have been using it more ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two tablets from other manufacturers in the past but this one brought me the real and professional experience that was missing in those two. It's sleek, fast, intuitive and packed with everything a user could ever ask for and yet, was extremely affordable. I got it at a great deal from Amazon and have been using it more often than I thought I would. I have not had any problems with it at all, and being a Samsung, I don't expect any. Compared to similar-sized tablets from other entities, this beats them hands down in style, performance and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: T. U.

customer_reviews.title: Screen Shut Off is Due to Magnet on Case
customer_reviews.text: The tablet screen would randomly go blank constantly. I've read other reviewers say the same thing. I thought it was a faulty tablet until I took it out of the case I had it in. It worked perfectly outside the case. The case I purchased had a flap that flipped over from back to front and attached via magnet to the front. The magnet messed with the tablet. Bought a case that attached at the corners instead of in the middle and no more issues. It's a great tablet now that it works and doesn't black out all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J-Bo

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tablet
customer_reviews.text: We are a Samsung Galaxy Tab family, and this addition did not disappoint us! We bought this one for my husband and he absolutely loves it. He literally uses it constantly and since it is newer than mine, I borrow it occasionally. It has clear resolution, he shows videos to kids, takes a ton of pictures that he posts to Facebook, and keeps his Google Drive organized. Both of us love the 10.1 because it isn't too small that you can't see what you are doing, but it is not so large that it is cumbersome. It just seems to be the handiest size available for us.
customer_reviews.author: BestsontheroadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My first tablet...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet! It’s my first one ever and it’s sooooo good!!! It’s like a giant cell phone that you can’t make calls on lol! But it’s great!!! Light, huge and handy!!!! Excuse the fingerprints, that’s my screen protector lol! It works so well too! I am not tech savvy but it works well. Does everything I need it to do! It’s not slow or anything either.
customer_reviews.author: Dege

customer_reviews.title: Great, just like my last Samsung Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tablet for the price. I don't know much about computers, but the ease of use and navigation makes it perfect for my needs. My last Samsung was slowing down after 6 years of solid use, which all tablets eventually do because of the battery life. My app's also are working better with the updated operating system on this one. I'll stick with Samsung if the quality stays as good as it is. So glad there is an alternative to the overpriced competitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I found myself needing to get a tablet very quickly to make schooling and working from home possible during this Covid-19 period. This tablet does everything I need (email, stream video and video chat over wifi) plus some things I like (use various apps, basic Microsoft office products). I'm very pleased that this tablet syncs with my Samsung phone and extended Google profile, so it's totally seamless. The seller had the best price around, and delivered in just 2 days. I'm very happy with the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always On feature quality tied to the tablet case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and thought I would return it as the Always On feature was acting up, or so I thought. What I found to be the problem was the rotating case with a large hole on the back that I had ordered and really liked. I ordered another case where they indicated that the tablet would light up when the case cover was opened and shut off when closed. It worked perfectly! To think I almost returned this because I thought it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: luvpasteis

customer_reviews.title: Update, Samsung is covering the repairs
customer_reviews.text: I only had this tablet for 3 months when it over heated and shut down and wouldn't come on again. Now I understand that stuff happens. I don't like that Samsung made me pay $16.00 to ship it to Them for repair! I also don't understand why they didn't know I paid for insurance to cover this tablet! I want my $16.00 dollars paid back to me!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Holland

customer_reviews.title: Good tab, but you can't purchase s-pen separately and make it work for this
customer_reviews.text: Best tab in it's range, purchased this as a gift and she loves it! Please note however that this was the version without S-pen, and purchasing an s-pen separately won't work. For some funny reason, the hardware technology on the version with s-pen and without s-pen are not the same. I did not find out until I had purchased it. However, I downloaded the inkredible app and purchased the MEKO universal stylus. Inkredible seems to have a palm reject technology which works for light-notes-taking needs. Other than that the tab works great.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: LOVELOVELOVE
customer_reviews.text: I just received this 2 hours ago and I'm already in love...I had a Samsung tablet before, then decided to try the Amazon fire...that was a big mistake on my part...I had the Fire for 10 months and gave up on it...how could I think I would love anything but Samsung?? lol...the icing on the cake? I ordered it on Cyber Monday and got it for 177.00 ...excuse me while I do a happy dance!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, great value
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery, well packaged and inclusive of the items you would expect to receive. Well designed, easy to use. I would purchase it again, should the need arise. I gave it to my mother as a gift and cannot vouch for its battery life, but it seemed very good after limited use.
customer_reviews.author: CDR335

customer_reviews.title: great little tablet for casual use
customer_reviews.text: great little tablet for casual use. It charges fast, performs flawlessly and has a moderate to long battery life. I'm not a power user, i mostly read email, ebooks and watch movies/tv shows on this tablet. I use this tablet a couple of hours a day, and it has performed flawlessly for several weeks. Also I installed a 64GB memory card when i got this tablet, because it's a little short on memory (but memory chips are cheap and easy to install ). There is some crapwear pre installed, but i ignore it, and it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: It works, and they fixed it when it broke
customer_reviews.text: You can spend more money and get an even sharper screen, etc., but this looks great and has snappy performance. Our unit quit functioning at month 11, but I'm keeping five stars because it was the best warranty experience I've ever had. I spoke with an actual person who took care of everything quickly. They provided a free shipping label, and we go the unit back in just a couple of weeks! They called aftewards to ask about our warrant experience. If it breaks later and we can't get warranty, I will update this post.
customer_reviews.author: SerenePDX

customer_reviews.title: Screen touch sensitivity is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: I have had Samsung phones for a long time, so I'm pretty used to various Samsung Android platforms. There was no learning curve on this tablet, for me. That being said, even after I adjusted the screen sensitivity, my touch would not register on the glass without extra effort. I may get a screen cover and see if that helps, but I'm not in a hurry to spend more money, right now.
customer_reviews.author: Austin reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was their leader in 2016 and Samsung has a policy to upgrade the OS for two years. So this one did upgrade to Android 8. Fast CPU and good graphics. Use it mainly to check email and play a few games. I purchased this one because I still wanted a 10.1" screen. I just don't like the newer and smaller 9.6" screens.
customer_reviews.author: GGRussell

customer_reviews.title: No Storage Expansion
customer_reviews.text: I always go LG for phones. This tablet reminds me why. I bought an SD card for space expansion, and I can't use it because of Samsung's file organization scheme. Samsung is continually disappointing and frustrating in interface and customization ability. I'm also quite upset that I cannot expand its storage with the SD card I bought simply because their file structure is terrible. It has an all right screen, sure, but there are other factors too.
customer_reviews.author: Auryn Vrvilo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet
customer_reviews.text: The best purchases I've made in a long time. The T580 does not have a pen. But you can buy one for about $20 compared to paying an extra $50 for the P580. If you're a Samsung Galaxy fan then you will love this. It's basically a large Samsung Galaxy cell phone without the phone capability. The price there's not much that can touch it for $157
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could ever want in a tablet. Easily Rootable
customer_reviews.text: Material quality picture quality sound quality it's all here and with XDA I actually am running pie on this device very easily rootable, would recommend this tablet to anyone yes it's more expensive you get what you paid for this is a glass screen a pretty good camera and incredible battery life. Battery lasts at least 12 hours of continuous use with screen at half brightness!! ...
customer_reviews.author: Sky Tripp-Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase-Nice Tablet
customer_reviews.text: As an Apple user I was a little hesitant to purchase this. It took me a little bit to get used to it, but after a month I'm glad I bought it. The screen is clear and it takes good pictures. There are loads of apps from the play store (most are ad heavy). The processor is quick enough and I purchased a 64 gb memory card so I could store extra books and pictures. The battery life seems pretty good. I only have to charge it once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: 2 Tablets with identical issues, not worth buying!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our special needs daughter (who uses it extensively) and the 1st tablet lasted 3 months before the screen went out. We were lucky and were able to return it due to covid extension. Hoping that maybe it was just a bad tablet, I ordered another one and within 3 months another screen went out. Unfortunately no return this time. I am a Samsung user for my cell phone and after 2 tablets later, I would not recommend this particular one!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Gramling

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Very fast, long battery life, huge picture perfect screen.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tablet. Its huge! We first tried ordering used off of ebay, description matching a galaxy tab A 10.1". Instead we received the 8" with undisclosed issues. Thankfully we got a refund and went with amazon! The 10.1" is an amazing tablet, perfect size, ridiculously long battery life, great picture quality and sound. We use it primarily to stream movies and shows, its lightning fast compared to our kindles. 100% happy with this tablet and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaJean

customer_reviews.title: Probably the finest tablet you can get for under $200.00.
customer_reviews.text: Wow- Samsung hit the ball out of the park wit this one, and at this price. For the money, this is the tablet I want. I had compared this to the Tab E, which is actually more expensive, yet this one has better specs all the way around. You really have to watch what you read. This Tab has 2GB RAM. The Tab E is written on Amazon as having 16GB RAM, which is absurd (The Tab E -actually- has 1.5 GB RAM, and 16GB internal storage, two completely different things. Anyway- for under 200 bucks, you're not going to find a better tablet than this one, for most purposes. A fine, solid, worthy piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Williams

customer_reviews.title: My first tablet
customer_reviews.text: Before you hate on me for stating I'm a MAC guy, realize I just think they are built better and faster etc. But when I priced the tablets there was no way I was spending that kind of money for something I didn't know if I would use. I did my research and came across reviews on this Samsung tab a. I have to tell you, from the packaging to the moment I powered it up, it has been nothing less than a delight. Fast, crisp, and the build quality is impressive. And to think I paid $500 less than I would have for an iPad. My computer universe is now diversified.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Use with S Pen
customer_reviews.text: The listing made it seem that this tablet was the model that did not come with an s pen. That was ok, I planned on getting a few s pens anyway as this tablet was for graphics the s pen is a nice change for my painful hand. After days of searching I learned it is NOT that this tablet does not come with the pen - it is not compatible with the pen. It is a software and memory issue. On Prime day this looked just a great sale item but the model # was not listed at that time. Very misleading, and I feel it was intentional.
customer_reviews.author: A L Entrekin

customer_reviews.title: NO HD VIDEO!
customer_reviews.text: THIS JUNK DOESN"T PLAY NETFLIX HD!!! STAY AWAY FROM SAMSUNG!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tablet for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a new tablet when I found this one and I love it! Screen clarity is great and it is definitely a upgrade in size from last one as far as the screen size. The speakers aren't all that great but if I want to watch a movie I use my television or I plug in my ear buds for my tablet so no biggie. Over all i would definitely recommend this tablet to anyone looking for a affordable tablet with a quality build
customer_reviews.author: TwistedGoat_FPV

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last but great while it did!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in March of 2020. It is now August of 2020 and it won't turn on. I put it in a sup case right out of the package. It is pristine on the outside. I have no idea what happened it just stopped working. Buuuuuuuuut! It was amazing when it did work. Beautiful screen and quality! Wish it lasted at least a year 😒
customer_reviews.author: Briana Cox

customer_reviews.title: This tablet keeps closing the web pages
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it in November as a Christmas gift which was not opened until the end of December. It was not used much in January and February because we were away from home. The table keeps closing the web page or app. I've reached out to Amazon who forwarded it to the seller who sent a note to reach out to Amazon. No resolution as of yet. I either want my money back or a working tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected. I love it. Much better than my other tablet I had. Works much faster, and the apps work better on this tab. I would definitely recommend it to others. It really is a great tablet. Plus the apps download super fast, so you don't have to wait that long. It's usefulness is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Pass on the Fire HD
customer_reviews.text: Audio using onboard speakers would be the only downfall. Fast moving video suffers a bit of tearing. Raplaced my Fire 10HD with this as the Fire HD is not Firestick compatible, no Google Play so no way to watch in flight entertainment using GO-GO on most airlines. My new Samsung is perfect for flying,no issues.
customer_reviews.author: UbenSlayed

customer_reviews.title: Amazon vendors suck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the tablet, but one of the two I purchased battery dead in a week. Sent it back and they refused to replace only refund. The second tablet dead a week later, and I had the battery replaced. Come to find out the batteries in them where the cheap Chinese batteries that catch fire all the time. Yeah OEM not!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: so if you're the type that uses your phone for everything it's a great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife as a valentines day present and she absolutely loves it. It's basically a giant cell phone, so if you're the type of person that uses your phone for everything it's a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Grenier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as his nearly 8 year tablet is not so great and soooo slow. Anyway I gave this to him for his birthday and he hasn't put it down... I have exactly the same one except mine is white and Ive had it a couple of years now and its still going strong. Love Love this tab!
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this tablet! Fast, beautiful screen, long life battery. I can use it all day long, watching movies, TV, have all of my platforms available, photos, music, use Word, and not run down the battery. Recommend a rapid charger for this, or charge it overnight because it does take a while. A bit heavy if you have to hold it. Recommend a good, sturdy case for this, like the Unicorn Beetle Pro Series, which also has a clear front shield.
customer_reviews.author: Wyllow

customer_reviews.title: Good for Music
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to display music when I rehearse and perform. I chose it because of it's high resolution display. Although I would have liked to have a slightly larger display, this has been working very well for me. I use an app designed for music to manage and display all of the files I have. The battery lasts a long time, more than enough to get me through a couple of rehearsals in one day! The display is bright, crisp and high contrast so the music is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: ksh

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet so far. This is my first non-Apple tablet....so far so good. I wish the screen was a little bigger but there again I'm used to an iPad. I worried initially about getting all my contacts and calendar events switched over to an Android device but linking everything to your Gmail account makes this pretty seamless across devices. I would highly recommend recommend ithis so far. If I had it to do over, I would have spent a little more for the 32 Gig storage model, although I haven't even used the external SD card storage as of yet so that will likely be a non-issue. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jordi

customer_reviews.title: Not mine, was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I cannot actually review this Samsung Galaxy Tab A SM-T580NZKAXAR 10.1-Inch 16 GB, Tablet (Black), because I bought it as a gift for my son. But since he is very knowledgeable, and a computer geek, and this is the one he asked for, my guess is it is perfect. I asked him how it works and he said, "Great!"
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel. Doesn't really hold up under regular use.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this case for 7 months. This case feels and looks great. Seems soft but it actually provides a good bit of protection. I have dropped my tablet couple times and escaped any damage. My only complaint is that the faux leather veneer is starting to delaminate in some areas. It seems to be mostly along the sides where I hold the case. If it had held up for a year I would have given at least 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GRACE

customer_reviews.title: Controls difficult to see
customer_reviews.text: The three control buttons at the bottom front of the tablet are invisible at night and I have to shift the tablet to get light on them so I can see the one I want to use; these buttons really do need to be lighted. Also, I find the tablet camera screen quality to be lacking crisp clarity. The screen picture is not nearly as clear as on my Android LG G6 phone screen. The battery life seems very good, and it is left unplugged for days at a time and the battery holds it's charge. Overall my wife really like her Samsung Galaxy Tab A.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Loving this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet! I bought it so I could get DROIDTV and haven’t regretted it once. Great screen size, especially on the plane. Touch screen responds well. The brightness is sometimes annoying and turning it up means I have to charge it more, but even then the battery life is still decent. Would buy again (but hoping it lasts a long time!)
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. But 16 GB is not enough memory if you like to play games on tablet. The sd card add on is great only for pictures and data but tablet won't let you store anything else like apps on it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Dependability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Tab a almost a year ago, have had no trouble at all. My wife has a tablet from another brand name and when we would check into a hotel it took a lot of work to log on to wifi. I recommended a samsung tab a, i never had the problem of logging on, to her and she has not had a problem since. We would buy the tab a again.
customer_reviews.author: gray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this tablet all the time. It's replaced my laptop for basic internet browsing and email. I do a lot of online shopping with it, too. It's probably not the fastest or most feature-filled tablet available, but it handles all the basics with ease - including most android games. For the money, this is a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it all in all.
customer_reviews.text: Great price but the 2016 model is a bit sluggish and has a tendency to freeze with some apps, like Recolor, which also freezes my phone. Probably the app and not the tablet. It's slow with Toon Blast going from one level to the next. With reading, video, making documents, or just browsing the web it's good. I'm happy with it all in all.
customer_reviews.author: DebS224

customer_reviews.title: All in for the inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an inexpensive hold over . But my upgrade purchase was still a samsung . This is good for multimedia but the external speakers are a bit anemic . I still enjoyed it and it really is good for the money but any outside noise can drown out the audibly of it a bit .
customer_reviews.author: M.Goding

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet to replace my old one that could not connect to a keyboard. I previously had a Samsung tablet. This one synced to my old Samsung tablet and installed all of the apps that were on my old tablet. This was very easy to setup! I also bought a keyboard and it synced perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BeagleMom

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet less than 6 months ago. At first I couldn't understand why there were negative reviews as the tablet seemed to do everything I needed with no problems. Fast forward 5 months and now the screen won't turn on and you can hear noise when you touch screen but it stays black. I contacted Samsung for repair and was told that if this tablet was purchased from Amazon there is no warranty from Samsung. When I contacted Amazon they told me the return window is 1 month. Spend your money on a better tablet or buy it from Samsung so you have a warranty!! If not you will be buying another one in a short time.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: ... this a "budget tablet" because it works so much better, has so much more function
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why people call this a "budget tablet" because it works so much better, has so much more function, is so much easier to use than an overrated, expensive iPad. Make sure to buy a screen protector and a case! I would recommend this to ANYONE who is interested for a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Loan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Worst tablet or computer I have ever encountered
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Web browser (Chrome) opens automatically to annoying Samsung marketing page and there seems to be no way to disable that or delete that bookmark. My son warned me about purchasing a Samsung product. I should have listened. I just wasted my money on a product I find unusable and can't seem to find help for my problem on the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With It
customer_reviews.text: What a difference from my old 7" Galaxy tablet with KitKat! This one was well-priced and has Marshmallow. I caught it on a low-price day, and had a refund credit from another purchase to apply. It's so much faster than my old one. I'm getting used to the large size, in a good way. A very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BiblioAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for a great price during prime day weekend and boy am I glad I did! The tablet is awesome! It's pretty light, has an awesome battery life and doesn't lag. The only little problem I have is sometimes it's hard to click on the screen. It's seems like I have to tap it a couple of times in one spot for it to respond. But I use the stylus, so it's not really even a big deal. Overall, great tablet
customer_reviews.author: Wmo2016

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. I bought it so I would be able to watch something on a flight I was taking. I think the size is perfect and the picture is great. I wish it came with more memory, but there is a slot for a memory card. I also had an issue with the small magnetic strips coming out of the frame of the tablet, but not a huge deal. They stuck to my case and I was able to put them back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: For use in tracking our new Ring security System
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is beautiful and has so many features that my old tablet doesn't have. We are not as technical as we would like and are having some problems setting up the security system. This is no fault of the tablet, but our inadequacy on how to set up the Ring system. We hope to get some help this weekend from a neighbor who is more proficient in this activity.
customer_reviews.author: Dancy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy anything less than 32 GB device memory
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. 16 GB is simply not enough device memory. Forget about adding the memory card. There are too many everyday apps that require device memory for installation. Once you load up apps you are out of device memory. I have a 128 GB memory card that I have barely used because most of the apps I want require device memory. In addition, video is not HD quality, nor is sound. Also, you'll regret not having cellular capability. Save your money and buy a better device with all the top features.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I use my tablet everyday. I mostly read books, but that is because of our fancy phones, but I do use it for other stuff too. I love my tablet and take it everywhere. One time I forgot it at my daughter's and felt so lost without it. That was when I realized how much I use it for so many things. I would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: It really does seem to be true that you get what you pay for. I have usually purchased less expensive tablets and have had problems with them. This is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Stop working
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for my job, but it did not lost the year, it stop working, did not even used it much. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Haniff Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lousy wiring design. Screen will fail.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Better off spending less than paying extra for a known screen issue that Samsung hasn't recalled or rectified. The tablet looks brand new and has had a covert on it since right after unboxing. Limited use and the screen blacked out. 2/2 I've had had the same issue occur. Not worth the Samsung tag.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch of a 2016 model tablet (NOT THE NEW MODEL)!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tablet assuming that it was the most recent 2019 model. It is actually the SM-T580 T585 2016 Released (Old model) as I found out when the case I ordered didn't fit and I had to do some digging online. No where in the discription does it say that this is a 2016 tablet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The tab died in less than a year. It died abruptly while I was using it. Can't recommend sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Mastulah N.

customer_reviews.title: Good value tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet for light gaming and web surfing. Came with android 7.0. Added a 64gb Samsung SD card for any files, to save space, as this is only 16gb, and out of the box it's only about 9. I disabled the preloaded apps I'm not using and it makes a difference. Got it for lowest price I've seen. Fast, picture quality is excellent and the battery life is amazing. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: joyful44

customer_reviews.title: Screen Malfunctioned After a Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother. She only uses it to read the news and play light games such as Bejeweled. It was working just fine until about a year in, the tablet just stopped working. The screen just stopped working...no sign of it charging and no matter what troubleshooting techniques I try, nothing gets the screen to turn on. I can't seem to find anyone to help me either. Good brand, bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A SM-T580NZKAXAR 10.1-Inch 16 GB, Tablet (Black)
product_meta.description: Style:Tablet| Color:BlackEnjoy powerful performance and a vibrant display with the Black 10.1" Galaxy Tab a from Samsung. This tablet features a Samsung exynos 7870 chip set, which utilizes an octa core processor clocked at speeds up to 1.6 GHz. It comes with 2GB of RAM and 16GB of built in storage. It's also equipped with a micro SD slot that supports microSDXC cards up to 2TB. Bluetooth 4.2 connectivity is also integrated for pairing with Bluetooth enabled devices, such as Select headphones and accessories. Troubleshoot: For software related issues can be resolved by performing a factory reset on the product which will reload the software back to new in box condition by turning off the device and while pressing and holding the volume up key and the home key, pressing the power key. All personal information should be backed up prior to this step as it will delete all customer and local content. While unfortunate, all electronics regardless of manufacturer have a small possibility of having problems. If this is the case, the customer can contact 1 800 Samsung for troubleshooting, support and if required repair through Samsung Warranty service. Location Technology GPS,Glonass.
feature_bullets: 1.6 GHz exynos 7870 octa core Processor. 10.1" wuxga Display, 8Mp rear camera + 2Mp front camera
Os: android 6.0 Marshmallow. Battery Type and Size:Li Ion 7,300mAh
Refer User manual in Technical Specification before use
Music play time is up to 187 hours. Video play time is up to 13 hours. Internet use time is up to 13 hours. Wi fi connectivity is 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, 2.4GHz plus 5.0 GHz, vht80

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,306 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
